description: To edit the settings contained in a SCONF file, select Script → Settings → Change... , make your edits, click Apply , and then select OK .
To create a SCONF file, select Script → Settings → Save as... , choose the save location (the default location is in the "conf" folder), name the file, and click Save .
To load a SCONF file, select Script → Settings → Load... , navigate to your file, and click Open .
